OOC: nope, she was working in anoter lab, out the area of high risk 
labs.

Blacknightmare:

"We're dealing with a virus desinged to kill or put the bot in stasis 
lock" answered Blacknightmare "Virus was contained by that doors, 
we're not in danger here, but a bot it's dead and three in stasis 
lock... we'll need Blaze's help"and opened her comm link said "Blaze 
can you come here???"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Bullet fealt relieved that Blacknightmare had informed him of the 
situation.
> The bull in him still wanted to charge in but he was smart enough 
to know
> that the virus would easily destroy him too. "What are we dealing 
with?" he
> asked hoping to know how bad the situation was. "Are we in any 
danger?" He
> was concerned for the troops. If the situation was bad enough 
they'd all be
> in deep trouble.
> 
> OOC Was the lab Blaze was working in in the contaminated area?
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <airly2000@y...>

the

> > BlackNightmare

> > transformed back

> > > about my orders to protect Chameleon?" he asked, torn between 
the
> > orders
> > > he'd recieved. On one hand he would follow orders to protect the

> > > and put the whole base at risk, or on the other hand he follows 
the
> > orders
> > > to stop and admits failure.

I'll

> > > > > BIC
> > > > >
> > > > > Bullet exits his quarters fully recharged and ready to do 
his
> > duty.
> > > > Even if his duty was to play nursemaid to a lizard. Being
> > sentenced
> > > > to protect Chameleon was a fate worse than death. The bull
> > would've
> > > > rather have faced a fireing squad than bear such indignity.
> > > > >
> > > > > Alarms sounded (Logically they'd go off since a virus had 
been
> > > > released.) chiming the release of a dangerous material into 
the
> > ships
> > > > atmosphere. Bullet checked the computer for Chameleons
> > location. "Why
> > > > am I not surprised?" he thought when he found that the bot he 
was
> > to
> > > > protect was right in the middle of the action. He transformed 
to
> > bull
> > > > and rushed through the halls toward the disturbance hoping the
> > doors
> > > > to that level hadn't blocked it off to protect the rest of the
> > ship.
